description: This table stores the coding and abstracting flags that have been added to or removed from the hospital accounts.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CA_FLAG_HX_A_INST
columns.description: This item indicates when the Coding and Abstracting (C&A) Flag was added.

columns.name: CA_FLAG_HX_R_INST
columns.description: This item indicates when the Coding and Abstracting (C&A) Flag was removed.
